DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation patch specific immunotherapy allergic patient
DOC.brief_title: Study Specific Allergen Immunotherapy Grass Pollen Allergic Subjects Epicutaneous Allergen Administration
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Written inform consent History grass pollen allergic rhinitis Male female 18 year 65 year Positive skinprick test grass pollen Positive conjunctival provocation test Exclusion criterion : Eczematous skin lesion upper arm Perennial allergic rhinitis Symptoms infectious disease rhinitis last 2 week Surgical intervention last 30 day Pregnancy nurse History HIV AIDS History mastocytosis ( cutaneous systemic ) History significant cardiovascular disease Hypertension ( blood pressure > 160 / 95 ) History significant pulmonary , renal and/or hepatic disease History significant hematological disorder Moderate severe asthma History malignancy History neurological psychiatric disease History autoimmune disease Antihistamines long halflives last week Systemic topical steroid 5 day Active infectious disease Contraindicated medication : immunosuppressive agent Betablockers ACEinhibitors , AT 2 Antagonists tricyclic antidepressant daily use Betaagonists steroid inhaler Participation another clinical trial /study moment within last 60 day
